description.message: Automatically learns to block hidden trackers. Made by leading digital rights nonprofit EFF to stop companies from spying on you.
description.description: Extension description used by browsers and extension store websites. LIMITED TO 132 CHARACTERS. See also 'intro_welcome', 'share_base_message' and 'intro_learns_paragraph' messages.

canvas_fingerprinting.description: Canvas fingerprinting is the tracking method described in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canvas_fingerprinting

popup_help_button.description: Tooltip shown over the question mark button in the upper right corner of the popup.

popup_share_button.description: Tooltip shown over the share button in the upper right corner of the popup.

popup_special_page_header.message: Tiada sebarang untuk dilakukan di laman ini

popup_special_page_paragraph.message: Privacy Badger tidak berfungsi pada laman istimewa seperti ini. Cuba layari di tempat lain.
popup_special_page_paragraph.description: Shown in the popup for special browser pages such as the New Tab page and 'about:' pages.

popup_first_run_header.description: Heading in the popup when opened from the intro page.

popup_disabled_site_header.message: Privacy Badger dinyahaktifkan di laman web ini
popup_disabled_site_header.description: Shown in the popup on disabled sites.

popup_enable_for_site.description: Button in the popup, visible if Privacy Badger is disabled on the current site.

report_broken_site.description: Button in the popup and title of the error reporting form overlay.

popup_donate_to_eff.message: Donate to EFFâ€”a nonprofit defending digital privacy
popup_donate_to_eff.description: A link in the popup footer.

popup_review_pb.message: Enjoying Privacy Badger? Leave a review!
popup_review_pb.description: A link in the popup footer shown 30% of the time instead of 'Donate to EFF'.

version.description: Version text in the popup footer. For example, "version 2018.8.1".

popup_instructions.description: Popup message shown when at least one tracker was blocked.

popup_instructions_no_trackers.description: Text shown in the popup when there are no trackers on the page.

popup_blocked.message: Tiada sumber pihak ketiga pada laman ini. Hooray untuk privasi!
popup_blocked.description: Text shown in the popup when showing non-tracking domains is enabled, and there are no third-party domains on the page.

tooltip_block.message: Gerakkan slider ke kiri bagi menyekati domain

tooltip_allow.message: Gerakkan slider ke kanan bagi membenarkan domain

badger_status_block.description: Tooltip shown over a domain name with a red slider in the domain slider list. This is a status ("example.com was blocked"), not an action ("click here to block example.com").

badger_status_cookieblock.description: Tooltip shown over a domain name with a yellow slider in the domain slider list.

badger_status_blocked_scripts.message: Kuki dan skrip pengecapan jari yang disekat dari $DOMAIN$
badger_status_blocked_scripts.description: Tooltip for cookie-blocked domains that tried to load one or more fingerprinting scripts.

badger_status_allow.description: Tooltip shown over a tracking but still allowed (green slider) domain name in the domain slider list.

badger_status_noaction.description: Tooltip shown over a non-tracking domain name with a green slider in the domain slider list.

dnt_tooltip.message: Domain ini berjanji untuk tidak menjejak anda
dnt_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown over an EFF's DNT policy-compliant domain name in the list of domains in the popup or under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

domain_slider_block_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown over the leftmost part of a domain slider. This is an action ("click here to ..."), not a status.

domain_slider_cookieblock_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown over the center part of a domain slider.

domain_slider_allow_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown over the rightmost part of a domain slider.

breakage_warning_tooltip.message: Menyekati domain ini diketahui boleh merosakkan laman-laman web
breakage_warning_tooltip.description: Tooltip for a warning icon that appears when move a domain slider to 'red' (block) for a domain that was automatically set to 'yellow' (block cookies).

google_signin_tooltip.message: Bagi membenarkan log masuk ke laman web dengan akaun Google anda, gerakkan slider ini ke kanan dan muat semula halaman
google_signin_tooltip.description: Tooltip for a notification icon that appears next to the slider for accounts.google.com when it is blocked by default.

feed_the_badger_title.message: Klik bagi mengembalikan kendalian domain ini ke Privacy Badger
feed_the_badger_title.description: Tooltip shown over an undo arrow that appears when you move a domain slider away from its automatic setting.

not_yet_blocked_header.message: Badger anda belum memutuskan sama ada domain ini harus disekat
not_yet_blocked_header.description: Popup domain slider list header text. Separates blocked domains from domains that haven't yet been seen perform tracking on enough sites.

intro_not_an_adblocker_paragraph.message: Privacy Badger mula menyekat sebaik sahaja ia melihat penjejak yang sama pada tiga laman web berbeza. Tiga serangan dan ianya terkeluar!

non_tracker.message: Domain di bawah kelihatan tidak menjejaki anda
non_tracker.description: Popup domain slider list header text. Separates domains with detected tracking from domains where no tracking has yet been detected.

non_tracker_tip.message: Pada masa ini, Privacy Badger hanya menyemak sama ada pihak ketiga menggunakan kuki, storan lokal HTML5 atau kecapan jari kanvas untuk menjejaki pelayaran anda. Sesetengah domain ini mungkin menggunakan kaedah penjejakan yang tidak boleh dikesan oleh Privacy Badger.

report_input_label.description: Label for the text input in the 'Report broken site' overlay.

error_input.description: Placeholder text in the text input in the 'Report broken site' overlay.

report_terms.message: Ini secara automatik akan menghantar maklumat berikut kepada EFF: halaman yang sedang anda lawati, versi pelayar web anda, versi Privacy Badger, dan keadaan kesemua slider di halaman ini.

share_title.description: Title of the Share popup overlay.

share_tracker_header.message: Privacy Badger telah sekati $COUNT$ penjejak berpotensi pada $DOMAIN$:
share_tracker_header.description: Header above the list of tracking domains in the share message.

share_base_message.message: Privacy Badger (privacybadger.org) is a browser extension that automatically learns to block hidden trackers. Privacy Badger is made by the Electronic Frontier Foundation, a nonprofit that fights for your rights online.
share_base_message.description: The base message that is always included in the share message.

copy_button_initial.description: Initial text of the copy button on the share overlay.

copy_button_copied.description: On-click text of the copy button on the share overlay.

popup_info_firstparty_protections.description: Clickable status header text in the popup. Shown when Privacy Badger's link tracking protection is active (for example, on facebook.com).

popup_info_firstparty_description.message: Sesetengah laman web $LINK_START$menggunakan penjejakan pautan untuk mengikuti anda$LINK_END$ apabila anda mengklik pautan untuk meninggalkan laman web tersebut. Privacy Badger membuangkan penjejakan dari pautan tersebut di laman web ini.
popup_info_firstparty_description.description: Text revealed by clicking on the link tracking protection header in the popup

popup_info_youtube.message: Ads not blocked? YouTube not working? It's probably not because of Privacy Badger.
popup_info_youtube.description: Message in the popup when users visit YouTube.com

extension_error_text.message: Sila $LINK_START$ beritahu kami$LINK_END$ mengenai ralat berikut:
extension_error_text.description: NOTE: The space after $LINK_START$ is here to work around a Safari bug. Shown in the popup when there is an extension error we want to encourage the user to tell us about.

firstRun_title.message: Terima kasih kerana memasang Privacy Badger!
firstRun_title.description: Title and header of the intro page.

intro_by_eff.description: Message in the header of the intro page.

intro_welcome.message: Privacy Badger automatically learns to block hidden trackers. Take a minute to see how.

intro_beyond_ads_paragraph.message: Privacy Badger menghantar isyarat Global Privacy Control, untuk mengeluarkan anda dari perkongsian dan penjualan data, dan isyarat Do Not Track untuk memberitahu syarikat-syarikat untuk tidak menjejaki anda.

intro_beyond_ads_paragraph2.message: If they ignore these signals, Privacy Badger will learn to block themâ€”whether they are advertisers or trackers of other kinds.

intro_learns_paragraph.message: Privacy Badger menemui secara automatik penjejak-penjejak berdasarkan tingkah laku mereka.

intro_not_an_adblocker_paragraph2.message: Hidden tracking happens in all sorts of ways; ads are just the visible tip of the iceberg. Privacy Badger doesn't block ads unless they happen to be tracking you.

next_section.description: Image alt. text on a couple of "scroll down" arrow buttons on the intro page.

intro_open_popup.description: Shown above an image of the Privacy Badger icon circled on the browser toolbar.

intro_open_popup_alt.message: Browser toolbar with the Privacy Badger icon circled
intro_open_popup_alt.description: Alt text for toolbar icon image, which is shown below the intro_open_popup header.

intro_disable_button.message: Jika anda fikir Privacy Badger memecahkan laman (contohnya, video tidak dapat dimainkan), anda boleh mengklik butang 'Nyahaktifkan' bagi menyahaktifkan Privacy Badger bagi laman tersebut.
intro_disable_button.description: Intro page paragraph. The quoted string ('Disable') should match the verb used for the 'popup_disable_for_site' message.

intro_donate_heading.description: Part of the 'donate' section on the intro page.

intro_donate1.message: Apabila anda menggunakan Privacy Badger, anda menyertai Electronic Frontier Foundation dan berjuta-juta pengguna lain dalam perjuangan privasi. Kami adalah badan bukan kerajaan yang memperjuangkan hak atas talian anda. Terima kasih kerana menyertai kami!
intro_donate1.description: Part of the 'donate' section on the intro page.

donate_to_eff.description: A button on the intro page.

intro_donate_subheading.message: Bantu kami dengan menderma dan berkongsi sokongan anda untuk alatan kami
intro_donate_subheading.description: Shown below the Donate button on the intro page.

intro_link_policy.description: Shown at the bottom of the intro page.

intro_pin_nudge.message: First, $START_SPAN_TAG$pin Privacy Badger to your toolbar$END_SPAN_TAG$ for easy access to the "$DISABLE_FOR_SITE$" button.
intro_pin_nudge.description: Part of a Chrome-only overlay on the intro page

intro_pin_instructions.message: To pin Privacy Badger's icon, click on the puzzle piece icon in your browser toolbar. Then, click on the pin icon next to Privacy Badger.
intro_pin_instructions.description: Alt text for pinning instructions image. Shown on the Chrome-only overlay of the intro page.

share_button_title_facebook.description: Text shown when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the intro page.

share_button_title_twitter.description: Text shown when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the intro page.

share_button_title_mastodon.description: Text shown when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the intro page.

share_button_title_bluesky.description: Text shown when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the intro page.

options_title.description: Page title and heading text of options page

options_disable_tip_title.message: How to disable Privacy Badger without leaving the site
options_disable_tip_title.description: Title of tip container on Disabled Sites tab

options_disable_tip_alt.message: First, click on Privacy Badger's icon in your browser toolbar. Then, click the "$DISABLE_FOR_SITE$" button.
options_disable_tip_alt.description: Alt text for image inside tip container on Disabled Sites tab

disabled_for_these_domains.message: Privacy Badger dinyahaktifkan di lelaman berikut. Ini bermakna Privacy Badger tidak akan menyekat apa-apa apabila anda melawati lelaman yang tersenarai di sini, dan ia tidak akan menghantar isyarat Do Not Track atau Global Privacy Control.
disabled_for_these_domains.description: Intro text on the Disabled Sites options page tab

add_domain_button.description: Button on the Disabled Sites options page tab

remove_button.description: Button on the Disabled Sites options page tab

invalid_domain.message: Sila tambah domain atau URL yang sah
invalid_domain.description: Error text for the form on the Disabled Sites options page tab

options_general_settings.description: This is an options page tab heading.

options_enable_dnt_checkbox.message: Hantar laman-laman web isyarat "Global Privacy Control" dan "Do Not Track"
options_enable_dnt_checkbox.description: Checkbox label for toggling GPC and DNT signals, found in general settings.

options_dnt_policy_setting.message: Semak sekiranya domain pihak-ketiga mematuhi dasar Do Not Track EFF

options_disable_hyperlink_auditing.message: Halang laman daripada menjejak pautan yang anda klik ("pengauditan hiperpautan")

options_disable_google_nav_error_service.message: Nyahaktif penghantaran alamat web yang anda lawati ke Google. Ini menyahaktifkan cadangan untuk laman yang serupa apabila laman tidak boleh ditemui.
options_disable_google_nav_error_service.description: (Chrome only) Checkbox label in general settings.

options_disable_floc.description: Checkbox label in general settings. For what this disables, see https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2024/07/why-privacy-badger-opts-you-out-googles-privacy-sandbox

options_learn_setting.message: Belajar untuk menyekat penjejak baharu daripada pelayaran anda

local_learning_warning.message: Mengaktifkan pembelajaran boleh menjadikan anda lebih dikenal pasti kepada laman web

options_show_nontracking_domains_checkbo.message: Tunjuk domain yang kelihatan tidak menjejaki anda
options_show_nontracking_domains_checkbo.description: Checkbox label in general settings. Should match wording used in the 'non_tracker' message.

options_incognito_warning.message: Mengaktifkan pembelajaran dalam tetingkap Peribadi/Inkognito mungkin meninggalkan kesan sejarah pelayaran peribadi anda pada komputer anda. Secara biasa, Privacy Badger akan menyekat penjejak yang sudah diketahuinya dalam tetingkap Peribadi/Inkognito, tetapi ia tidak akan mempelajari tentang penjejak baharu. Anda mungkin mahu mengaktifak pilihan ini jika pelayaran anda banyak berlaku dalam tetingkap Peribadi/Inkognito.

options_widget_replacement_desc.message: Apabila menyekat butang sosial dan widget lain yang berpotensi berguna (video, audio, ulasan), Privacy Badger boleh menggantikannya dengan ruang-letak klik-untuk-aktifkan.
options_widget_replacement_desc.description: Introduction to the Widget Replacement tab on the options page

options_widget_exceptions_header.description: Header text on the Widget Replacement tab

options_hide_social_widgets.message: Block but don't replace the following widgets:
options_hide_social_widgets.description: Label for a form on the Widget Replacement tab

options_widget_site_exceptions_header.description: Header text on the Widget Replacement tab

options_widget_site_exceptions_label.message: Sentiasa benarkan widget di laman berikut:
options_widget_site_exceptions_label.description: Label for a form on the Widget Replacement tab

options_domain_list_tab.description: This is an options page tab heading.

options_domain_list_trackers.message: Privacy Badger telah memutuskan untuk menyekat $COUNT$ $TRACKER_LINK_START$domain penjejakan$TRACKER_LINK_END$ yang berpotensi setakat ini
options_domain_list_trackers.description: Shown on the Tracking Domains tab on the options page after Privacy Badger learned to block one or more domains

options_domain_list_no_trackers.message: Privacy Badger belum mengesan sebarang $LINK_START$ domain penjejakan$LINK_END$ lagi. Teruskan pelayaran!
options_domain_list_no_trackers.description: NOTE: The space after $LINK_START$ is here to work around a Safari bug. Shown on the Tracking Domains tab on the options page if all tracking domains have been removed.

what_is_a_tracker.description: Tooltip shown over the 'tracking domains' link under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

options_domain_search.description: Label for a text input box on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_domain_search_tooltip.message: Untuk mengecualikan domain, tambahkan istilah carian anda dengan "-". Contohnya, ".co -.com" akan menunjukkan domain .co dan .co.uk tetapi bukan domain .com.
options_domain_search_tooltip.description: Tooltip for an "information" icon next to the domain search input on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_domain_type_filter.description: Label for a dropdown control on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_domain_filter_all.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_domain_filter_user.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_domain_filter_dnt.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_domain_status_filter.description: Label for a dropdown control on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_domain_filter_block.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_domain_filter_cookieblock.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_domain_filter_allow.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_show_not_yet_blocked.message: Tunjukkan domain yang Badger anda belum putuskan untuk disekat
options_show_not_yet_blocked.description: Checkbox label on the Tracking Domains tab. Should match wording used in the 'not_yet_blocked_header' message. Only visible when 'learn to block new trackers' is enabled.

options_hide_in_seed.message: Hide domains present in the latest pre-trained list
options_hide_in_seed.description: Checkbox label on the Tracking Domains tab. Only visible when 'learn to block new trackers' is enabled.

options_domain_list_sites.description: Part of a tooltip available for each domain in the tracking domains list on the options page.

options_remove_origin_confirm.message: Adakah anda pasti mahu mengalih keluar domain ini daripada Privacy Badger?
options_remove_origin_confirm.description: Confirmation shown when you click to remove a domain from Privacy Badger's tracking domains list on the options page.

data_settings.description: This is an options page tab heading.

manage_data_intro.message:
Mengimport data pengguna:
  • Menulis-ganti tetapan umum
  • Menggabungkan senarai laman yang dinyahaktifkan
  • Menggabungkan maklumat tentang pepenjejak yang dilihat oleh Privacy Badger
  • Menulis-ganti penyesuaian slider
manage_data_intro.description: A brief explanation of what happens when you import Badger user data. Shown above the import/export user data buttons under the Manage Data options page tab.

download.description: Button text shown under both 'export_user_data' and 'download_cloud' headings.

import_successful.message: Senarai penjejak dan tetapan berjaya dikemas kini!

sync_intro.message:
Penyeragaman awan:
  • Memerlukan Firefox/Chrome Sync
  • Muat naik menulis semula sebarang data Privacy Badger sedia ada dalam awan
  • Muat turun menggabungkan senarai lelaman di mana Badger anda dinyahaktifkan
sync_intro.description: A brief explanation of how syncing works. Shown above the upload/download cloud data buttons under the Manage Data options page tab.

upload_cloud.message: Eksport laman yang dinyahaktifkan ke awan
upload_cloud.description: Button title for uploading data to the cloud on Manage Data options page tab.

upload.description: Button label for uploading data to the cloud on Manage Data options page tab.

download_cloud.message: Import laman yang dinyahaktifkan dari awan
download_cloud.description: Button title for downloading data from the cloud on Manage Data options page tab.

download_cloud_success.description: Message displayed to the user after successfully merging cloud data.

download_cloud_failure.message: Data awan tidak dapat dimuat turun.
download_cloud_failure.description: Message displayed to the user after failing to download cloud data.

upload_cloud_success.message: Data berjaya dimuat naik ke awan
upload_cloud_success.description: Message displayed to the user after successfully uploading local data.

upload_cloud_failure.message: Data tidak dapat dimuat naik ke awan
upload_cloud_failure.description: Message displayed to the user after failing to upload local data.

download_cloud_no_data.message: Tiada data awan untuk dimuat turun.
download_cloud_no_data.description: 'Error' message when there is on cloud data to download.

reset.description: Options page button, under the Manage Data tab

reset_data_confirm.message:
Penetapan semula domain penjejakan akan:

â€¢ Memadamkan kesemua data tentang penjejak yang telah dipelajari Privacy Badger daripada pelayaran anda
â€¢ Memulihkan senarai domain penjejakan kepada senarai pra-latihan terkini (layari www.eff.org/badger-pretraining untuk mengetahui lebih lanjut)
reset_data_confirm.description: Pop-up triggered when the reset_data button is clicked

remove_all.description: Options page button, under the Manage Data tab

remove_all_data_confirm.message:
Mengalih keluar kesemua domain penjejakan akan:

â€¢ Padamkan kesemua yang diketahui Privacy Badger tentang penjejak
â€¢ Menyebabkan Privacy Badger tidak menyekat apa-apa sehingga ia mempunyai peluang untuk pelajari semula daripada pelayaran anda
remove_all_data_confirm.description: Pop-up triggered when the remove_all_data button is clicked

intro_text1.message: Anda kini dilindungi oleh Privacy Badger.
intro_text1.description: First part of a reminder to visit the intro page. Shown in popup until the user clicks on the reminder link or browses through the intro page.

intro_text2.message: Untuk mengetahui cara Privacy Badger berfungsi, klik di bawah untuk mendapatkan tutorial pantas.
intro_text2.description: Second part of a reminder to visit the intro page

first_run_text.message: Ketahui cara Privacy Badger melindungi privasi anda
first_run_text.description: Part of a reminder to visit the intro page. Shown in popup until the user clicks on the reminder link or browses through the intro page.

learning_prompt_text1.message: Privacy Badger tidak lagi akan belajar daripada pelayaran anda secara biasa.
learning_prompt_text1.description: First part of a prompt to visit the blog.

learning_prompt_text2.message: Klik di bawah untuk mengetahui lebih lanjut.
learning_prompt_text2.description: Second part of a prompt to visit the blog.

learning_prompt_button.description: Button text, part of a prompt to visit the blog.

deprecated_setting.message: Tetapan berikut telah ditamatkan dan akan dialih keluar dalam kemas kini Privacy Badger akan datang:
deprecated_setting.description: Followed by the label of the deprecated setting (for example: 'Prevent WebRTC...')

social_tooltip_pb_has_replaced.message: Privacy Badger telah menggantikan $BUTTON$ butang ini
social_tooltip_pb_has_replaced.description: Tooltip shown over a replaced social button. For example, "Privacy Badger has replaced this Facebook Like button". See also the widget_placeholder_pb_has_replaced message.

widget_placeholder_pb_has_replaced.description: Text shown inside a replaced widget's placeholder. For example, "Privacy Badger has replaced this Google reCAPTCHA widget". See also the social_tooltip_pb_has_replaced message.

allow_once.description: Button in the placeholder shown in place of certain third-party (video, audio, commenting) widgets. Clicking it will allow the third-party widget to load this one time only.

allow_on_site.message: Sentiasa benarkan di laman web ini
allow_on_site.description: Button in the placeholder shown in place of certain third-party (video, audio, commenting) widgets. Clicking this button will always allow the widget to load on this particular site.
